testcase.name: An employee would like to check all their sent reimbursement requests
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: An employee would like to check all their sent reimbursement requests Given An employee is logged in and on the profile page ... passed in 3.765s When An employee clicks on the Reimbursement Requests link ... passed in 0.602s Then The employee is redirected to the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: An employee would like to submit a new reimbursement request via the input form
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: An employee would like to submit a new reimbursement request via the input form Given An employee is logged in and on the profile page ... passed in 2.976s Given An employee is on the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.619s When The employee clicks on the Submit new reimbursement request link ... passed in 1.512s And The employee fills in the Amount and Reason fields ... passed in 0.046s And The employee clicks on the Submit Request button ... passed in 1.669s Then The employee is redirected to the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.010s And The new reimbursement request is added to the page ... passed in 0.821s And The employee can delete the new reimbursement ... passed in 1.684s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: An employee would like to submit a new reimbursement request via uploading a file
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: An employee would like to submit a new reimbursement request via uploading a file Given An employee is logged in and on the profile page ... passed in 2.032s Given An employee is on the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.526s When The employee clicks on the Submit new reimbursement request link ... passed in 1.333s And The employee uploads a file ... passed in 0.032s And The employee clicks on the Upload File button ... passed in 1.580s Then The employee is redirected to the Reimbursement Requests page ... passed in 0.009s And The new reimbursement request is added to the page ... passed in 0.881s And The employee can delete the new reimbursement ... passed in 1.734s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
